column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1e4b08389d729bc0d132fd9255d836b8872d9af4 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Can you combine this with a `make translate` so that we get the update to the English translation at the same time?\n
Currently I can't because ./configure in my MinGW shell isn't working `configure: error: Could not find a version of the boost_system library!`. I was still using my good old bitcoin-qt.pro...\n
Are you providing --with-boost-libdir=LIB_DIR to point it at the right directory?\nAnyhow, I can do it this time.\n
